name: Can'tDecide
0:
”Alexa, Open Can't Decide”
”Draw Lots”
”Deal everyone a card”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: can't decide
des:
Can't decide on something?
-Who gets to go first?
-Who gets that last piece of pizza?
-Who has to run an errand or take out the trash?

Whatever it is, this app has some simple tiebreakers for you to decide.

For groups, you can:
-draw lots/draw the short stick
-deal everyone one card, highest wins
-Lay out cards face down, everyone gets to turn one over, highest wins

You can have each person play themselves:
-Rock Paper Scissors against Alexa
-Two cards face down, try to guess the higher card

Also, some simple things:
-Flip a coin
-Draw one random card

For those, you have to figure out how you want to use them.

A silly simple app, but for those times you can't find a coin to flip or a deck of cards to draw from.

A Lou Bagel & DongleByte production
https://www.LouBagel.com
http://www.DongleByte.com
Follow us on Twitter at @LouBagelCombo5 & @DongleByte

If you have any feedback or suggestions you can DM me on Twitter as I plan to add a few more things, so can fix something as needed. Thanks.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
